pathAssistantSteps.info:
New: The customer has completed the handoff call with the DE/AE. and they have what they need to start building initial use cases in Retool.


To advance to Build stage:


  • Log a Call with type AE Handoff Notes containing your notes from the handoff call
  • Ensure all fields in the Implementation Details section are complete


When you have completed these steps, click Mark Stage as Complete.Â

Unassigned: The customer just signed the deal with Retool and has not been introduced to their Deployed Engineer yet.


To advance to New stage and handoff this implementation to a Deployed Engineer, complete the following:


  • Ensure a Success Owner and Customer Tier are both assigned on the account record
  • Schedule a handoff call with the Success Owner and note the date in Success Intro Date
  • Complete as much information as you can in the Implementation Details section


When you have completed these steps, click Mark Stage as Complete. The implementation will automatically be transferred into the Success Owner's name.
